title: Looking at 3 Cannabis Stocks Using Seeking Alpha's Quant Ratings And Factor Grades With Steven Cress
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Steven Cress is Seeking Alpha's Head of Quant Strategy. He joins the show today to give listeners an idea of what Seeking Alpha's Quant Ratings and Factor Grades can provide for investors. We'll be focusing on what these ratings mean for 3 cannabis stocks: Canopy Growth, Aurora Cannabis and Khiron Life Sciences, and for the cannabis sector in general. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
